pr_title: Unify headers and use file names in hadoop [doc only]

timeline.message:
Unify headers and use file names in hadoop [doc only]

Signed-off-by: Jan Jansen <jan.jansen@gdata.de>

timeline.bodyText: Why does every file have read- prefix?
timeline.author: porunov
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -87,22 +84,22 @@ JanusGraph directly supports following graphReader classes:
 The following `.properties` files can be used to connect a JanusGraph
 instance such that it can be used with HadoopGraph to run OLAP queries.
 
-```properties tab='CqlInputFormat'
+```properties tab='read-cql.properties'

replies.bodyText: You can find these files in the release zip.
replies.author: farodin91
